content: sea monkey baby hat by kelly mcclure this cheeky little hat is adored by babies and their parents too using a ball of dishcloth cotton is economical machine washable and the fibre is gentle on baby s noggin plus the little ears are just so darn cute this hat is knit from the bottom to the crown with a worsted weight cotton the top seam is either sewn up or grafted together the ears are formed with the corners and cinched into shape this hat has three sizes and no visible seam there is a slightly visible seam on the garter style brim bohoknits patterns 2015 © kelly mcclure kelly@bohoknits com this pattern is for personal use only patterns or items made from this pattern cannot be sold for profit sea monkey baby hat pg 2 the technical stuff skill level skill level rookie-apprentice-virtuoso-genius rookie-apprentice-virtuoso-genius skills knit purl grafting optional skills knit purl grafting optional sizes newborn 0-6 months 6-12 months sizes newborn 0-6 months 6-12 months gauge gauge approx 20 sts and 28 row = 10 cm in st st on approx 20 sts and 28 row = 4 in st st on us 7 4 5 mm as given on ball band as given on ball band approx 18 sts = 10 cm in st st on 5 mm approx 18 sts = 4 in st st on us 8 yarn worsted weight dishcloth cotton yarn worsted weight dishcloth cotton suggested brand suggested brand 1 ball estelle sudz 1 ball estelle sudz 100% cotton 100% cotton 74 m per 50 g 80 yds per 1 75 oz or any dishcloth / crafting cotton or any dishcloth / crafting cotton needles needles 5 mm 30 cm circs 40 cm can be used for 6-12 us 8 12 circs 16 can be used for 6-12 months size months size 5 mm dpns for grafting -
